title: Brown v. Board of Education National Historic Site: Buses in Civil Rights Movement
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Buses in Civil Rights Movement              Buses In The Civil Rights Movement       On this page we explore several of the pivotal events of the civil rights movement that involved buses. Visit again soon to read the stories of Claudette Colvin, Jackie Robinson, and the students of the Brown v. Board of Education case.
